start: Welcome. This is Bot-Scheduler. He can help you to schedule your tasks fast and accurate. Just type your plans and he will automatically find scheduling date and what's to schedule ⏰ This bot also can recognize voice messages 🎤 It is an open source project and is available here. Available commands: 🗓 /list Shows active tasks for this chat. 🗑 /del 1, 2, ...id Deletes tasks by id. 🗑 /del 1-10, A-B Deletes all tasks within range. #️⃣ /N Deletes N-th task. 🌐 /tz Configures time zone.
